mapper.select: select a.*,FORMAT(a.wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS_TAIL b WHERE b.info_num = a.num) AS tail_count from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS a where 1=1 and part = 'notice' and wtype = 'Y' and flag = 'N' order by num desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, FORMAT(a.sdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS sdate_format, FORMAT(a.edate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS edate_format,
CASE WHEN getdate() < sdate THEN 'B' WHEN getdate() BETWEEN sdate AND edate and etc2 ='N' THEN 'I' ELSE 'E' END AS event_status
FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS a where 1=1 and a.part = 'event' and a.flag = 'N'
and (a.subject like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') or a.content like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%'))
and a.sdate < getdate()
) A ORDER BY num desc OFFSET (#{currentPage}-1)*#{limit} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

select top 8 a.*,FORMAT(a.wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_NAME(writer) writer2, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.num) AS rownum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE_TAIL b WHERE b.info_num = a.num) AS tail_count from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE a where 1=1 and a.chk_del = 'N' and a.id = #{member_id}

select count(*) from ( select a.*,FORMAT(a.wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS a where 1=1 and a.part = 'event' and a.flag = 'N'
and (a.subject like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') or a.content like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%'))
and a.sdate < getdate()
) A

select a.*,FORMAT(a.wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE_TAIL b WHERE b.info_num = a.num) AS tail_count from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE a where 1=1 and a.flag = 'Y' and a.chk_del = 'N' order by a.num desc
mapper.update: update KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE set visited = visited +1 where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select *,FORMAT(wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_ID(id) as id2, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_NAME(writer) writer2 from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE where num = #{num}
SELECT * FROM ( select * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_WALLPAPER ) A ORDER BY year_month desc OFFSET (#{currentPage}-1)*#{limit} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM ( select *,FORMAT(wdate , 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS formatted_date, FORMAT(wdate, 'HH:mm') AS formatted_time, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_ID(id) as id2, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_NAME(writer) writer2 from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE_TAIL where info_num = #{num} ) A ORDER BY num desc OFFSET (#{currentPage}-1)*#{limit} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

select TOP 1 a.*,FORMAT(a.wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_ID(id) as id2, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_NAME(writer) writer2, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE_TAIL b WHERE b.info_num = a.num) AS tail_count from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE a where 1=1 and a.chk_del = 'N' and a.num > #{num} ORDER BY a.num

select TOP 1 a.*,FORMAT(a.wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_ID(id) as id2, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_NAME(writer) writer2, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE_TAIL b WHERE b.info_num = a.num) AS tail_count from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE a where 1=1 and a.chk_del = 'N' and a.num < #{num} ORDER BY a.num DESC
mapper.update: merge into KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE A using ( select #{num} AS num ,#{subject} AS subject ,#{content} AS content ,#{id} AS id ,#{writer} AS writer ,#{ip} AS ip ) B on A.num = B.num WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE set A.subject = B.subject ,A.content = B.content WHEN not MATCHED THEN INSERT ( subject ,content ,flag ,id ,writer ,ip ,wdate ,chk_del ,visited ,ref ,step ,ansnum ,tn ,pn ,recommend ) values ( B.subject ,B.content ,'N' ,B.id ,B.writer ,B.ip ,getdate() ,'N' ,0 ,0 ,0 ,0 ,0 ,0 ,0 );
update KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_FREE set chk_del = 'Y' where num= #{num}
